name: protractor-cucumber-steps
description: Cucumber steps (step definitions) written with Protractor for e2e tests

scripts.patch: npm version patch -m "Bumped up package version to %s" && git push && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m "Bumped up package version to %s" && git push && npm publish
scripts.major: npm version major -m "Bumped up package version to %s" && git push && npm publish

author: Dmytro Shpakovskyi
